name: AutoRoom
author: PhasecoreX
Kreusada (Modified)
description: Allows for designating voice channels as AutoRoom sources. When a user joins an AutoRoom source, they will be moved into their own personal on-demand voice channel (AutoRoom). Once all users have left the AutoRoom, it is automatically deleted.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
